mapper.select: DECLARE @fecha varchar(10) SET @fecha = #{ultimoDiaMes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} SELECT ( CASE WHEN ( datediff(day, @fecha, c.fecha_esp_liq) ) < 8 THEN '1 a 7 dias' WHEN datediff(day, @fecha, c.fecha_esp_liq) BETWEEN 8 AND 30 THEN '7 dias a 1 mes' WHEN datediff(day, @fecha, c.fecha_esp_liq) BETWEEN 31 AND 89 THEN '1 a 3 meses' WHEN datediff(day, @fecha, c.fecha_esp_liq) BETWEEN 90 AND 179 THEN '3 a 6 meses' WHEN datediff(day, @fecha, c.fecha_esp_liq) BETWEEN 180 AND 365 THEN '6 meses a 1 a単o' WHEN datediff(day, @fecha, c.fecha_esp_liq) BETWEEN 366 AND 730 THEN '1 a 2 a単os' ELSE 'OTRO' END ) AS bucket, s.status_cv AS status, s.propietario AS propietario, count(1) AS cuantos, sum(round(round(s.capital_insoluto,2) + round(s.devengado_por_pagar,2),2)) AS monto FROM finsol_contratos_hist c JOIN finsol_saldos_hist s ON c.contrato = s.contrato WHERE s.mes = #{yearmonth, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND c.mes = #{yearmonth, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND s.status IN ('D','N') AND s.propietario = '000002011' GROUP BY ( CASE WHEN ( datediff(day, @fecha, c.fecha_esp_liq) ) < 8 THEN '1 a 7 dias' WHEN datediff(day, @fecha, c.fecha_esp_liq) BETWEEN 8 AND 30 THEN '7 dias a 1 mes' WHEN datediff(day, @fecha, c.fecha_esp_liq) BETWEEN 31 AND 89 THEN '1 a 3 meses' WHEN datediff(day, @fecha, c.fecha_esp_liq) BETWEEN 90 AND 179 THEN '3 a 6 meses' WHEN datediff(day, @fecha, c.fecha_esp_liq) BETWEEN 180 AND 365 THEN '6 meses a 1 a単o' WHEN datediff(day, @fecha, c.fecha_esp_liq) BETWEEN 366 AND 730 THEN '1 a 2 a単os' ELSE 'OTRO' END ) , s.status_cv, s.propietario
